subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Lou Piniella, a former Seattle Mariners manager who led the team to its only four postseason appearances, was to be inducted into the Mariners hall of fame on Saturday.
snippet: Lou Piniella, a former Seattle Mariners manager who led the team to its only four postseason appearances, was to be inducted into the Mariners hall of fame on Saturday.
